thread.title: SAN BERNARDINO: Man shot, killed by police
thread.title_full: SAN BERNARDINO: Man shot, killed by police - Press Enterprise

author: ALEX GROVES
title: SAN BERNARDINO: Man shot, killed by police
text:
By ALEX GROVES / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 11, 2015 Updated: 11:11 p.m. SAN BERNARDINO: Man shot, killed by police Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» One person was killed in an officer involved shooting in San Bernardino Sunday, Oct. 11, authorities said.
The shooting occured about 3:39 p.m. in the area of West 5th Street and North Sierra Way near Seccombe Lake Park in San Bernardino, said Lt. Dario Robinson of the San Bernardino Police Department.
Robinson said officers were responding to a report of a man with a gun when the incident happened. He could not say whether the man pointed his gun at the officers.
The officer who fired the shot was still being interviewed by police officials about what happened shortly before 6:30 p.m., Robinson said.
He was not able to provide any additional details late Sunday.
